info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 03 at 2:42PM MDT until August 04 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THURSDAY FOR LOW HUMIDITY, GUSTY WINDS, AND DRY LIGHTNING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 134, 135, 136, AND 137... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 134, 135, 136 and 137. * TIMING...Through 9 pm Thursday. * WINDS...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. Gusty and shifting winds are possible near thunderstorms Thursday afternoon and evening. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 10 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Highs will be in the mid 90s to low 100s on Thursday. * IMPACTS...Any new fire starts will be difficult to contain.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Red Flag Warning.
